header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Complaining, friends, holiday, explaining, injuries, food.
header.activity: Catch-up with housemate and mother after a weekend in Paris
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, anecdote telling
